text: Ikyawann is a 2017 Indian television series, which is broadcast on Star Plus and stream on Hotstar. The show is premiered on 13 November 2017.The Show is Going Off Air on 1 June 2018 and it will get replaced by Sabse Smart Kaun. ==Plot== The story of the show centers around a diffident girl, Susheel, 51st child of the Parekh family. A road accident kills all the female members of Parekh family except Susheel's mother. Avni gives birth to Susheel but dies. The accident was planned by Leela, Kiran's mother, who wants revenge for her daughter. Otherside, Satya is the grandson of Leela. The story follows these two main characters as they fall in love and try to overcome their personal and family problems. ==Cast and characters== ===Main=== * Prachi Tehlan as Susheel Parekh * Namish Taneja as Satya Ajmera ===Recurring=== * Priyank Tatariya as Mehul Parekh * Anwar Fatehan as Banke Parekh * Kavita Vaid as Leela Ajmera * Nabeel Ahmed as Vishu Ajmera * Neha Yadav as Sejal Ajmera * Pallavi Bharti as Dr. Kali Ajmera * Puneet Panjwani as Naresh Parekh * Jai Vats as Nitish Parekh * Komal Dhillon as Kiran Ajmera * Akshitta Arora as Jhano ==References== == Other websites == * Ikyawann Streaming on Hotstar Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2017 Indian television series debuts Category:2018 Indian television series endings
title: Ikyawann
